messages.title: Protect our Greenbelt
messages.content: Fred Mackintosh is working hard with local people to oppose plans by developers to build 100 houses in The Kilm. Behind the rhetoric by Bredeland Estates the fact is there was no consultation and local people have to live with the consequences.

messages.title: Final steps to a fairer Scotland
messages.content: Fairer taxes, a fairer community, a fair start and a fair deal for you are the guiding principles.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposing plans by developers to build 100 houses in The Kilm, emphasizing the lack of consultation and local people's concerns.
Nick Clegg's tax plan means that you will pay nothing on the first £10,000 you earn - cutting tax for most bills by over £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Four steps to a fairer Scotland
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to fair taxes, a fair community, a fair start by opposing tuition fees, and a fair deal away from the politics of the old guard.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Just 405 votes to go in Edinburgh South with neck and neck Labour and the Lib Dems contest. The tactical message suggests choosing Fred Mackintosh as he could win over Labour.

issues.environment: Opposition to housing development in The Kilm due to lack of consultation and impact on local residents.

housing.content: Opposing plans by developers to build 100 houses in The Kilm, emphasizing the lack of consultation and local people's concerns.

leaflet.personalStatement: A record of action; a promise of more. Fred Mackintosh has a record of action for the people of South Edinburgh.

politicalExperience.achievements: Work on local issues such as education, environment and crime.

endorsements.endorsement: Working together for a fairer Edinburgh South.

quotes.text: We need a real change. The last thing Edinburgh South needs is another government yes man.

images.caption: Fred Mackintosh and local campaigners at a greenbelt area.
Fred Mackintosh with Mike Pringle MSP opposing tuition fees.
Fred Mackintosh presenting a notice or award with a group of people.
Fred Mackintosh at a local event with children.
